獅城.definition: the Lion City, nickname for Singapore 新加坡[Xin1jia1po1]

獅子座.definition: Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

獅子林園.definition: Lion Grove Garden in Suzhou, Jiangsu

獅子鄉.definition: Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

獅尾狒.definition: gelada (Theropithecus gelada), Ethiopian herbivorous monkey similar to baboon; also written 吉爾達|吉尔达[ji2 er3 da2]

獅心王理查.definition: Richard the Lionheart (1157-1199), King Richard I of England 1189-1199

獅泉河.definition: Sengge Tsangpo or Shiquan River in west Tibet, the upper reaches of the Indus

獅潭.definition: Shitan or Shihtan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

獅潭鄉.definition: Shitan or Shihtan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

獅虎獸.definition: liger, hybrid cross between a male lion and a tigress

獅頭石竹.definition: grenadine; carnation; clove pink; Dianthus caryophyllus (botany)
